pkgmetadata.longdescription:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/touch.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/touch/)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/)### Installation```bash$ [sudo] pip install touch```#### Examples```python>>> import touch>>> touch.touch("path/to/file")>>> touch.touch(["path/to/file1","path/to/file2"])```
